entry.title: Monday: Chance of showers. High 15. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of showers near noon. Clearing this afternoon. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. High 15. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Monday 17 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of rain. Low plus 2.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness near midnight then periods of rain beginning before morning. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 overnight. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Monday 17 April 2023
